title: Complete Audio Bible Free for Non-Commercial Use (KJV) OT & NT
description:
This is a recording of the King James Version of the Bible.  This audio book is the voice of the reader alone.  However, this is a world-class orator.  It does not have the distraction of background music and dramatic sound effects.   

I bought the two CD set to share online.  When purchasing this audio bible the materials said that \"You can give away copies of these Bible audio files for non-commercial purposes.. You can convert them to audio CD, cassette and other audio formats.\"

So please enjoy this bible without guilt, you didn\&#039;t steal anything by downloading and sharing this audio bible.  You are welcome to it.

Please remain online to share this bible after you have downloaded all of the files!  Do it for weeks or months.  This is a unique opportunity to minister to the world.
